title: North America Rules the Encryption Software Market with the Highest Market Share
text:
The report titled Encryption Software Market – North America Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, deployment model, end-user, application and industry vertical. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Changing dynamics of Cyber-attacks in the region prompting adoption
Cyber-attacks are a common phenomenon for North American businesses. Of the 10 attacks that takes place in entire world, 8 occurs in North America, especially in the US or Canadian geographies. One of the obvious reasons for this targeted attacks has been in the greater usage of technology by the businesses here. The growing implementation of programs like BYOD among the businesses here has created an opportunity for the hackers to carry-out cyber-attacks. As a result, the rate of cyber-attacks in this part of the world is growing close to 20% every year. All these factors are turning out to be the catalyst for adoption of encryption software and the market for encryption software is expected to grow further; thanks to the introduction of cloud based version and increased adoption among small and medium businesses.
In 2014 alone, there were several data breaches reported in North America alone. The data breach involving Sony Pictures, the attacks on the US State Department database and the famous Penn State Hospital breach has been among the numerous data breaches that happened last year. According to the IT security experts, most of these attacks could have been averted had these companies implemented basic encryption solutions in their operations. Most of the breaches were said to have happened via email hacks which were not encrypted and sent in plain text format.
However, the scenario here is fast changing and businesses of every level who deal with critical data or information are adopting encryption solutions. Moreover, with the introduction of cloud based versions, the small businesses here are now explicitly adopting these solutions. As cyber-attacks are becoming a norm in this part of the world, the demand for more advanced encryption software is expected to take-off.
